MSS is a leading management consulting firm and provider of business application consulting services including strategic IT planning, Business Process Modeling(BPM), Enterprise Resource Planning(ERP), Customer Relationship Management(CRM), Supply Chain Management(SCM), and Business Intelligence(BI) projects.MSS differs from other consulting firms by using methodologies that empower our customers with our knowledge during the engagement process. MSS collaborates with and educates our customers during our engagements in order to reduce cost, increase ROI, and build their understanding of how to adapt business application systems to their needs and achieve the lowest cost of ownership for enterprise applications.MSS supports customers from offices and resources in Phoenix, Tucson, Denver, and Greater Los Angeles area.  MSS teams with leading business application technology providers including:▪Oracle JD Edwards(JDE)▪Oracle E-Business Suite(EBS) formally Oracle Applications▪IFS Applications▪Cognos(IBM)
Micon, Inc, provided information systems services to the electric, gas, and energy utility industry. With Mr. Hawksworth as President, Micon grew to an Inc. 500 company in 1991.

summary: Michael Hawksworth brings over 30 years of experience providing clients with information systems consulting services as the Chief Executive Officer at MSS Technologies, Inc. In 1986 he was co-founder and President of Micon, Inc, providing information systems services to the electric and gas utility industry. Under his direction, Micon grew to an Inc. 500 company in 1991. MSS Technologies was spun-off from Micon in June 1992 with Mr. Hawksworth as President, becoming an independent and separate entity focused on providing cost effective business application solutions, including ERP implementation to mid-market companies with products from SAP, Oracle and IFS. Michael started his information systems consulting career with Arthur Andersen & Co,’s Management Information Consulting Division, now Accenture, after receiving a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Information Systems from Arizona State University in 1979.Specialties: Strategic IT PlanningEnterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Selection & ImplementationSupply ChainBusiness Intelligence/Data WarehouseEnterprise Information PortalsMSS provides solutions for your business with products by Oracle, IFS,  Cognos, IBM, and Business Objects.
name: Mike Hawksworth
title: President/CEO, MSS Management Consulting Services
